(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (NP
          (NP (JJ many) (NNS people))
          (VP (VBG writing)
            (PP (TO to)
              (S
                (NP (PRP me))
                (VP (VBG asking)
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNS tips))
                      (PP (IN on)
                        (SBAR
                          (WHADVP (WRB how))
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB take)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (JJR better) (NN food) (NNS pictures))
                                  (CC and)
                                  (NP
                                    (NP (DT the) (NN kind))
                                    (PP (IN of)
                                      (NP (NN camera) (NN equipment)))))))))))))))))))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP use))
    (. .)))


nsubj(have-2, I-1)
dep(use-25, have-2)
amod(people-4, many-3)
dobj(have-2, people-4)
partmod(people-4, writing-5)
prep(writing-5, to-6)
nsubj(asking-8, me-7)
pcomp(to-6, asking-8)
prep(asking-8, for-9)
pobj(for-9, tips-10)
prep(tips-10, on-11)
advmod(take-14, how-12)
aux(take-14, to-13)
pcomp(on-11, take-14)
amod(pictures-17, better-15)
nn(pictures-17, food-16)
dobj(take-14, pictures-17)
cc(pictures-17, and-18)
det(kind-20, the-19)
conj(pictures-17, kind-20)
prep(kind-20, of-21)
nn(equipment-23, camera-22)
pobj(of-21, equipment-23)
nsubj(use-25, I-24)
root(ROOT-0, use-25)


(ROOT
  (S (CC And)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB also))
    (VP (VBP know)
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT some) (NNS kakis))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBP are)
                (VP (VBG thinking)
                  (PP (IN about)
                    (S
                      (VP
                        (VP (VBG starting)
                          (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ own) (NN food) (NNS blogs)))
                        (CC but)
                        (VP (VBG wanting)
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB get)
                                (S
                                  (NP (DT some))
                                  (VP (VB advise)
                                    (PP (IN on)
                                      (SBAR
                                        (WHNP (WP what))
                                        (S
                                          (NP (NN camera))
                                          (VP (TO to)
                                            (VP (VB get))))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(know-4, And-1)
nsubj(know-4, I-2)
advmod(know-4, also-3)
root(ROOT-0, know-4)
prep(know-4, of-5)
det(kakis-7, some-6)
pobj(of-5, kakis-7)
nsubj(thinking-10, who-8)
aux(thinking-10, are-9)
rcmod(kakis-7, thinking-10)
prep(thinking-10, about-11)
pcomp(about-11, starting-12)
poss(blogs-16, their-13)
amod(blogs-16, own-14)
nn(blogs-16, food-15)
dobj(starting-12, blogs-16)
cc(starting-12, but-17)
conj(starting-12, wanting-18)
aux(get-20, to-19)
xcomp(wanting-18, get-20)
nsubj(advise-22, some-21)
ccomp(get-20, advise-22)
prep(advise-22, on-23)
dobj(get-27, what-24)
nsubj(get-27, camera-25)
aux(get-27, to-26)
pcomp(on-23, get-27)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S (IN So)
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBD thought)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (MD would))))))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB share)
        (NP (DT some) (JJ simple) (NNS tips))
        (PP (IN on)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB make)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP$ your) (NN food) (NNS photos))
                    (VP (VB look)
                      (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ droolsome)))))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(thought-3, So-1)
nsubj(thought-3, I-2)
dep(share-8, thought-3)
nsubj(would-5, I-4)
ccomp(thought-3, would-5)
nsubj(share-8, I-6)
aux(share-8, would-7)
root(ROOT-0, share-8)
det(tips-11, some-9)
amod(tips-11, simple-10)
dobj(share-8, tips-11)
prep(share-8, on-12)
advmod(make-15, how-13)
aux(make-15, to-14)
pcomp(on-12, make-15)
poss(photos-18, your-16)
nn(photos-18, food-17)
nsubj(look-19, photos-18)
ccomp(make-15, look-19)
advmod(droolsome-21, more-20)
acomp(look-19, droolsome-21)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJ first) (NN thing))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP need)))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN camera)))
    (. .)))


det(thing-3, The-1)
amod(thing-3, first-2)
nsubj(camera-9, thing-3)
nsubj(need-5, you-4)
rcmod(thing-3, need-5)
cop(camera-9, is-6)
det(camera-9, a-7)
amod(camera-9, good-8)
root(ROOT-0, camera-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP use)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (JJ digital) (NN SLR))
            (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
              (NP (NNP Single) (NNP Lens) (NNP Reflex))
              (-RRB- -RRB-)))
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB take)
              (NP
                (NP (JJS most))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS pictures)))))))))
    (CC but)
    (S
      (NP (DT some) (NNS people))
      (VP (MD might)
        (VP (VB find)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ DSLR)
            (ADJP
              (ADJP
                (NP (DT a) (RB little))
                (JJ intimidating))
              (CC and)
              (ADJP (RB too) (JJ cumbersome)))
            (NN lug))
          (ADVP (RB around)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(use-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, use-2)
det(SLR-5, a-3)
amod(SLR-5, digital-4)
nsubj(take-12, SLR-5)
nn(Reflex-9, Single-7)
nn(Reflex-9, Lens-8)
appos(SLR-5, Reflex-9)
aux(take-12, to-11)
xcomp(use-2, take-12)
dobj(take-12, most-13)
prep(most-13, of-14)
poss(pictures-16, my-15)
pobj(of-14, pictures-16)
cc(use-2, but-17)
det(people-19, some-18)
nsubj(find-21, people-19)
aux(find-21, might-20)
conj(use-2, find-21)
det(lug-30, a-22)
amod(lug-30, DSLR-23)
det(little-25, a-24)
npadvmod(intimidating-26, little-25)
amod(lug-30, intimidating-26)
cc(intimidating-26, and-27)
advmod(cumbersome-29, too-28)
conj(intimidating-26, cumbersome-29)
dobj(find-21, lug-30)
advmod(find-21, around-31)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (SBAR (IN if)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP are)
          (ADVP (RB just))
          (VP (VBG starting)
            (PRT (RP out))))
        (, ,)))))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)
mark(starting-6, if-2)
nsubj(starting-6, you-3)
aux(starting-6, are-4)
advmod(starting-6, just-5)
dep(So-1, starting-6)
prt(starting-6, out-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD would)
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (VP (VB want)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB buy)
              (NP
                (NP (NN something))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT that))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (ADJP (JJ affordable)))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(want-4, you-1)
aux(want-4, would-2)
advmod(want-4, probably-3)
root(ROOT-0, want-4)
aux(buy-6, to-5)
xcomp(want-4, buy-6)
dobj(buy-6, something-7)
nsubj(affordable-10, that-8)
cop(affordable-10, is-9)
rcmod(something-7, affordable-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBZ handy)
      (CC and)
      (VBZ takes)
      (NP
        (ADJP (RB reasonably) (JJ good))
        (NNS pictures)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, handy-1)
cc(handy-1, and-2)
conj(handy-1, takes-3)
advmod(good-5, reasonably-4)
amod(pictures-6, good-5)
dobj(handy-1, pictures-6)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (VP (VBD let)
      (NP (PRP me))
      (PP
        (NP (NN share))
        (IN with)
        (NP (PRP you))))
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (CD One) (NNP Golden) (NNP Rule))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT that))
        (S
          (VP (MD will)
            (ADVP (RB instantly))
            (VP (VB make)
              (S
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS photos))
                (VP (VB look)
                  (NP (CD 100) (NN %)))))))))))


advmod(let-2, Now-1)
root(ROOT-0, let-2)
dobj(let-2, me-3)
npadvmod(with-5, share-4)
prep(let-2, with-5)
pobj(with-5, you-6)
det(Rule-10, the-7)
num(Rule-10, One-8)
nn(Rule-10, Golden-9)
nsubj(let-2, Rule-10)
nsubj(make-14, that-11)
aux(make-14, will-12)
advmod(make-14, instantly-13)
rcmod(Rule-10, make-14)
poss(photos-16, your-15)
nsubj(look-17, photos-16)
ccomp(make-14, look-17)
num(%-19, 100-18)
dobj(look-17, %-19)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADJP (JJR better))
    (: :)))


root(ROOT-0, better-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB As) (RB far))
    (SBAR (IN as)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (MD can)
          (VP (VB help)
            (S
              (NP (PRP it))
              (ADJP (JJ -)))))))))


advmod(far-2, As-1)
root(ROOT-0, far-2)
mark(help-6, as-3)
nsubj(help-6, you-4)
aux(help-6, can-5)
dep(far-2, help-6)
nsubj(--8, it-7)
